title: 19th century social and economic system - Russia

content.question: The estate owner’s admonition that the Tsar cannot give orders directly to the serfs is best understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: The assertion of Eastern Orthodox religious traditions
The push by reformers to end serfdom
Russia’s humiliation in the Crimean War

content.answer: The push by reformers to end serfdom

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
